nodes.text: An overcharged power cell was a lightsaber modification that allowed a lightsaber's power cell to overcharge, strengthening the saber's blade. However, this process caused the power cell to become unstable, which meant that the saber's blade had a chance of becoming weak in the middle of a fight. An overcharged power cell cost 500 credits.
Overcharged power cells were mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
